body.content: Minnesota Twins: Jason Heyward diagnosed with a sore knee, is day-to-day for one week.
Cleveland Indians: Iván Negrón diagnosed with a torn rotator cuff, will miss 4 months.
St. Louis Cardinals: SS Drew Mendoza was injured in a collision at a base. The diagnosis is not yet known.
Washington Nationals: 1B Casey Gillaspie was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: hamstring cramp. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 4 days.
Los Angeles Angels: LF Blake Rutherford was injured while throwing the ball. The Diagnosis: mild oblique strain. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 4 days.
Minnesota Twins: RF Dany Rojas was injured on a defensive play. The diagnosis is not yet known.
Cleveland Indians: SS Francisco Lindor was injured while throwing the ball. The Diagnosis: sprained ankle. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 4 days.
Pittsburgh Pirates: Raúl Rivera diagnosed with a bruised finger, is day-to-day for 5 days.
Minnesota Twins: Dany Rojas diagnosed with a broken kneecap, will miss 5 months.
Kansas City Royals: 3B Nick Delmonico was injured while throwing the ball. The diagnosis is not yet known.
Chicago White Sox: CF Curtis Whitten was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: bruised shoulder. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 3 days.
New York Yankees: SP Jim Robertson was injured while pitching. The diagnosis is not yet known.
Houston Astros: Isranel Wilson diagnosed with a ruptured finger tendon, will miss 4 months.
New York Yankees: Jim Robertson diagnosed with a bone spur in his elbow, will miss 4-5 months.
Tampa Bay Rays: 3B Matt Mervis was injured while running the bases. The diagnosis is not yet known.
Los Angeles Dodgers: CF Jeren Kendall was injured while running the bases. The Diagnosis: strained back. This is a day-to-day injury expected to last 6 days.
Houston Astros: 1B Luken Baker was injured on a defensive play. The diagnosis is not yet known.
Tampa Bay Rays: C Matt Thaiss was injured while running the bases. The diagnosis is not yet known.
Cincinnati Reds: SP Noah Syndergaard was injured while pitching. The diagnosis is not yet known.
